title: Current-carrying wires - magnetic force on 2 wires

content.question: Two long, parallel current-carrying wires are separated by a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> with currents in the directions shown. Wire <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has a current <math alttext="I sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> directed toward the top of the page, and Wire <math alttext="B " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> has a current <math alttext="I sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math> directed toward the bottom of the page. Which of the following is equal to the magnitude of the force per meter exerted by Wire <math alttext="A " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> on Wire <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, I sub A, end sub, I sub B, and denominator 2 pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, I sub A, end sub, I sub B, and denominator 4 pi d squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, I sub A, end sub, I sub B, and denominator d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, I sub A, end sub, I sub B, and denominator d squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, I sub A, end sub, I sub B, and denominator 2 pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
